thread.title: Ed (part time framer)
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by Ed (part time framer)

author: Ed (part time framer)
title: Ed (part time framer)
text:
First purchase from American Frame.
Best packed delivery I have ever received including hundreds of purchases from Amazon. I could not believe how well it was strapped and protected with very thick card board. I was worried my 40 x 32 size mat board would come with a corner or two crushed. Not so Arrived pristine. They also had everything I needed on a well organized website as opposed to many of the others I have used in the past.
Thanks American Frame,
Ed (part time framer)
